localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: It is tiring to save contacts all the time, Whatsapp already has a feature to chat without saving, but it is a hassle to write it. So I created a helper website to solve that problem. The country code will be saved in localStorage.
blogPost.body: It is tiring to save contacts all the time, Whatsapp already has a feature to chat without saving, but it is a hassle to write it. So I created a helper website to solve that problem. The country code will be saved in localStorage.
blogPost.title: WhatsApp Helper - A WhatsApp helper to avoid saving number to your contacts
blogPost.author: Theodorus Clarence

localize.description: 連絡先をずっと保存するのは疲れる、Whatsappには保存せずにチャットする機能がすでにあるが、書くのが面倒だ。そこで、その問題を解決するためのヘルパーサイトを作ってみました。国番号はlocalStorageに保存されます。
localize.tagline: 連絡先に番号を保存しないためのWhatsAppヘルパー

localize.description: 一直保存联系人很累，Whatsapp已经有了不保存聊天的功能，但写起来很麻烦。所以我创建了一个辅助网站来解决这个问题。国家代码将被保存在localStorage中。
localize.tagline: 一个避免将号码保存在联系人中的WhatsApp帮助工具

localize.description: 一直保存聯繫人很累，Whatsapp已經有了不保存聊天的功能，但寫起來很麻煩。所以我創建了一個輔助網站來解決這個問題。國家代碼將被保存在localStorage中。
localize.tagline: 一個避免將號碼保存在聯繫人中的WhatsApp幫助工具
